General.Name: Unitech Printed Circuit Board Corp
General.Description: Unitech Printed Circuit Board Corp. manufactures, trades in, distributes, imports, and exports printed circuit boards (PCB) in Taiwan. The company offers multilayer, high-density interconnection (HDI), and rigid-flex PCBs. Its products are used in smart devices, automobiles, and information/communication technology applications, such as smart phones, media tablets, smart wearable devices, feature phones, GPS, POS, networking and communication products, and DSC systems. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Chung-Shan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23680
